mapper.select: SELECT `TABLE_NAME` AS tableName, `COLUMN_NAME` AS columnName, `COLUMN_COMMENT` AS columnComment, `DATA_TYPE` AS dataType, `COLUMN_TYPE` AS columnType, `IS_NULLABLE` AS isNullable FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE 1=1 and table_schema = 'lucky_stock' AND table_name = 't_shop_info'
